content: **knitted hat and mittens in drops fiesta and drops kid-silk ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the confetti crush hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #confetticrushset drops design pattern fs-025 yarn group b + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- * **whole set ** **sizes** s/m m/l - l/xl **yarn for whole set ** yarn drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150-200 g colour 27 winter carnival and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50 g colour 14 red * **mittens ** **sizes** s/m m/l - l/xl circumference 18-19-20 cm length 26-27-28 cm **yarn for mittens** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 27 winter carnival and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25-25 g colour 14 red **needles for mittens ** drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 23 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember the needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get to few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-62-confetti-crush-hat
